timeline.bodyText: This test is useful but we need to add a test where the pipeline group is created and ensure it does a case insensitive match.
timeline.author: maheshp

timeline.message:
Make pipeline group case-insesitive (#7865)

* Perform case-insensitive pipeline group name equals check.

* When a user specifies a pipeline group name, while creating
  a new pipeline and the same group name with different case
  already exists, do not create a new group. Create the new
  pipeline in the existing pipeline group.
Fix duplicate pipeline group name issue while creating a new group
Fix duplicate pipeline group name issue while creating a new group
